descripcion:
A superb fertilizer for greens, tees, and fairways. Can be used for both soil and foliar feeding. Its low pH contributes to efficient nutrient uptake from the soil.

DERIVED FROM: Ammonium Sulfate, Ammonium Phosphate, Magnesium Sulfate (Anhydrous), Potassium Sulfate, Urea, Iron EDDHA, Iron EDTA, Manganese EDTA, Copper EDTA, Zinc EDTA, Sodium Molybdate. F1367.

POTENTIAL ACIDITY: 1555 lbs calcium carbonate equivalent per ton.

SOLUBILITY (max.): 3.5 lbs per gallon. Hot water and agitation improve solubility.
